class.name: PhysicsDirectBodyState
class.brief_description: Direct access object to a physics body in the [PhysicsServer].
class.description: Provides direct access to a physics body in the [PhysicsServer], allowing safe changes to physics properties. This object is passed via the direct state callback of rigid/character bodies, and is intended for changing the direct state of that body. See [method RigidBody._integrate_forces].

method.name: add_central_force
method.description: Adds a constant directional force without affecting rotation. This is equivalent to [code]add_force(force, Vector3(0,0,0))[/code].

method.name: add_force
method.description: Adds a positioned force to the body. Both the force and the offset from the body origin are in global coordinates.

method.name: add_torque
method.description: Adds a constant rotational force without affecting position.

method.name: apply_central_impulse
method.description: Applies a single directional impulse without affecting rotation. This is equivalent to [code]apply_impulse(Vector3(0, 0, 0), impulse)[/code].

method.name: apply_impulse
method.description: Applies a positioned impulse to the body. An impulse is time-independent! Applying an impulse every frame would result in a framerate-dependent force. For this reason it should only be used when simulating one-time impacts. The position uses the rotation of the global coordinate system, but is centered at the object's origin.

method.name: apply_torque_impulse
method.description: Apply a torque impulse (which will be affected by the body mass and shape). This will rotate the body around the vector [code]j[/code] passed as parameter.

method.name: get_contact_collider
method.description: Returns the collider's [RID].

method.name: get_contact_collider_id
method.description: Returns the collider's object id.

method.name: get_contact_collider_object
method.description: Returns the collider object.

method.name: get_contact_collider_position
method.description: Returns the contact position in the collider.

method.name: get_contact_collider_shape
method.description: Returns the collider's shape index.

method.name: get_contact_collider_velocity_at_position
method.description: Returns the linear velocity vector at the collider's contact point.

method.name: get_contact_count
method.description: Returns the number of contacts this body has with other bodies. [b]Note:[/b] By default, this returns 0 unless bodies are configured to monitor contacts. See [member RigidBody.contact_monitor].

method.name: get_contact_impulse
method.description: Impulse created by the contact. Only implemented for Bullet physics.

method.name: get_contact_local_normal
method.description: Returns the local normal at the contact point.

method.name: get_contact_local_position
method.description: Returns the local position of the contact point.

method.name: get_contact_local_shape
method.description: Returns the local shape index of the collision.

method.name: get_space_state
method.description: Returns the current state of the space, useful for queries.

method.name: get_velocity_at_local_position
method.description: Returns the body's velocity at the given relative position, including both translation and rotation.

method.name: integrate_forces
method.description: Calls the built-in force integration code.
